quote: They surrounded the Benʹja·min·ites and pursued them relentlessly. They trampled them down directly in front of Gibʹe·ah toward the east.
At that the king of Israel went home to Sa·marʹi·a, sullen and dejected.ooked, there at his head was a round loaf on heated stones and a jug of water. He ate and drank and lay down again.
